name: nait
description: Repository contains website for practice in NAIT

scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:games && npm run build:tables && npm run build:calculator && npm run build:stylus && npm run copy:js
scripts.copy:js: powershell -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force dist/assets/js | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force src/js/* dist/assets/js/"
